casebody.head_matter:
Isenberg, Appellant, v. Cotton. Fleisher v. Isenberg, Appellant.
Argued May 8, 1969.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
George W. Thompson, with him Baile, Thompson & Shea, for appellant.
Melvin G. Levy, with him Stanley R. Kotzen, and Levy and Levy, for appellee.
October 9, 1969:
